page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: The{United Reformed Church}was first built in 1845 on the site of a nearby shop,destroyed by a land mine during World War II.The present building was erected and dedicated a few yards from the original site in April 1953.At this time the other chapel in the village amalgamated and the two became known as Christ Church.In 1972 they became known as the United Reformed Church. Approximate weekly attendence, including the Sunday school at the two Sunday services is 25. Two clubs are connected with the church. From May 1984 to April 1985 there were 2 Baptisms,2 Weddings,3 Burials.
